content:
IService Interface

Definition

This is the marker interface for enabling interface Remoting for services. An IServiceRemotingListener provides remoting for all interfaces implemented by the service that derive from this interface. The remoted interfaces can be accessed via IServiceProxy on the client side.

In this Article

public interface IService
